trans-unit.source: Specifies a print controller that displays a document on a screen as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: 화면에 문서를 일련의 이미지로 표시 하는 인쇄 컨트롤러를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Typically, to use the print preview feature, you create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> class and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 만들 인쇄 미리 보기 기능을 사용 하려면 일반적으로 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>클래스 및 설정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>

trans-unit.source: The PreviewPrintController is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> classes, though you can use the PreviewPrintController when managing the display of your own print preview window.
trans-unit.target: 사용 되는 PreviewPrintController는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>고유한 인쇄 미리 보기 창의 표시를 관리 하는 경우에 PreviewPrintController를 사용할 수 있지만 클래스.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>

trans-unit.source: When used with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>, PreviewPrintController sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> of the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>, performs the print preview, and sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> back to the original value.
trans-unit.target: 와 함께 사용할 경우 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>, PreviewPrintController 설정는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>관련 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A>에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>, 인쇄 미리 보기를 수행 하 고 설정는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>원래 값으로 다시.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>만듭니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>인쇄 미리 보기 중 표시 되는.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: 후 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>호출 되는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>메서드 집합은 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>단일 페이지의 그래픽으로.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>메서드 지웁니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, 동안는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>메서드 개체 할당을 취소 합니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: 인쇄에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>네임 스페이스 개요.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Captures the pages of a document as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: 문서 페이지를 일련의 이미지로 캡처합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> image representation contained in a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo> to implement your own print preview form.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>표현에 포함 된 이미지는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo>양식 고유한 인쇄 미리 보기를 구현 하려면.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo"></xref> that contains the pages of a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: 형식의 배열 <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo"> </xref> 의 페이지를 포함 하는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> 일련의 이미지로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this controller is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: 이 컨트롤러 인쇄 미리 보기에 사용 되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>모든 경우

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a page in a print document.
trans-unit.target: 인쇄 문서에서 페이지를 미리 방법과 시기를 결정 하는 컨트롤 시퀀스를 완료 합니다.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPage is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPage 직후에 호출 되는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>발생는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>이벤트.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, this method is not called.
trans-unit.target: 내에서 예외가 throw 되는 경우는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>,이 메서드가 호출 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>만듭니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>인쇄 미리 보기 중 표시 되는.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: 후 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>호출 되는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>메서드 집합은 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>단일 페이지의 그래픽으로.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPage method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPage 메서드는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, 동안는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>메서드 개체 할당을 취소 합니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> 미리 볼 문서를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to preview a page in the print document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> 인쇄 문서 페이지를 미리 보는 방법에 대 한 데이터가 들어 있는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a print document.
trans-unit.target: 인쇄 문서를 미리 보는 방법과 시기를 결정 하는 컨트롤 시퀀스를 완료 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: 바로 뒤에이 메서드는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>발생는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>이벤트.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Even if an uncaught exception was thrown during the print preview process, OnEndPrint is called.
trans-unit.target: 인쇄 미리 보기 프로세스 동안 확인할 수 없는 예외가 throw 되었으면 하는 경우에 OnEndPrint 라고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>만듭니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>인쇄 미리 보기 중 표시 되는.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: 후 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>호출 되는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>메서드 집합은 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>단일 페이지의 그래픽으로.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the OnEndPrint method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>메서드 지웁니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>OnEndPrint 메서드는 개체의 할당을 취소 하는 반면,.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> 미리 볼 문서를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to preview the print document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> 인쇄 문서를 미리 보는 방법에 대 한 데이터가 들어 있는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a page in a print document.
trans-unit.target: 인쇄 문서에서 페이지를 미리 방법과 시기를 결정 하는 컨트롤 시퀀스를 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPage is called immediately before <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPage 바로 전에 호출 됩니다 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>발생는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>이벤트.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>만듭니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>인쇄 미리 보기 중 표시 되는.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the OnStartPage method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: 후 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>호출 OnStartPage 메서드 집합은 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>단일 페이지의 그래픽으로.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>메서드 지웁니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, 동안는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>메서드 개체 할당을 취소 합니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Anti-aliasing, also known as gray scaling, makes the print preview look better.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 앤티 앨리어싱에 회색 배율 라고도 더 보기 좋게 인쇄 미리 보기를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: However, the use of anti-aliasing can slow down the rendering speed.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 앤티 앨리어싱 사용 렌더링 속도가 느려질 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about anti-aliasing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 앤티앨리어싱 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A>속성.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> 미리 볼 문서를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to preview a page in the print document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> 인쇄 문서 페이지를 미리 보는 방법에 대 한 데이터가 들어 있는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of this parameter will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 처음에 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 이 매개 변수 속성이 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value returned from this method will be used to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드에서 반환 된 값이이 속성을 설정할 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that represents a page from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 에서 페이지를 나타내는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a print document.
trans-unit.target: 인쇄 문서를 미리 보는 방법과 시기를 결정 하는 컨트롤 시퀀스를 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint 직후 호출 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>발생는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>이벤트.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint 만듭니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>인쇄 미리 보기 중 표시 되는.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: After OnStartPrint is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint 호출 되 면는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>메서드 집합은 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>단일 페이지의 그래픽으로.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>메서드 지웁니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, 동안는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>메서드 개체 할당을 취소 합니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint verifies that the printer settings are valid.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint은 프린터 설정이 올바른지 확인 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> 미리 볼 문서를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> 문서를 인쇄 하는 방법에 대 한 데이터가 들어 있는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 명명 된 프린터가 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 속성이 존재 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use anti-aliasing when displaying the print preview.
trans-unit.target: 인쇄 미리 보기를 표시할 때 앤티앨리어싱을 사용할지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Anti-aliasing, also known as gray scaling, uses several shades of gray around areas of curves and diagonals in text to give the text a smoother appearance.
trans-unit.target: 앤티앨리어싱, 회색조로 알려져 곡선으로 분할 및 대각선의 영역 주위 여러 회색 음영을를 사용 하 여 텍스트를 원활 하 게 나타내기 위해를 확장 합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > While using anti-aliasing makes the print preview look better, it can slow down the rendering speed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 더 보기 좋게 인쇄 미리 보기를 사용 하면 앤티앨리어싱을 사용 하 여, 렌더링 속도가 속도가 느려질 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the print preview uses anti-aliasing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>인쇄 미리 보기 앤티앨리어싱;를 사용 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.
